unnormalised: Entertainment News: Stream On, You Crazy Diamonds!
normalised: Entertainment News: Stream On, You Crazy Diamonds!

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 - Are your eardrums weeping from another auto rickshaw serenade? Fear not, weary traveler! Music streaming services are officially more popular than ever. Forget cassettes, kids, it's all about the "Spotify Wrapped" bragging rights now.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty six - Are your eardrums weeping from another auto rickshaw serenade? Fear not, weary traveler! Music streaming services are officially more popular than ever. Forget cassettes, kids, it's all about the "Spotify Wrapped" bragging rights now.

unnormalised: New data suggests that even Grandma Kamla from Kanpur is ditching her Kumar Sanu CDs for a carefully curated "Bhakti Beats" playlist. Sources whisper that IIM Ahmedabad is running a case study: "The ROI of Raaga: Can Classical Music Save Your Startup?".
normalised: New data suggests that even Grandma Kamla from Kanpur is ditching her Kumar Sanu C D's for a carefully curated "Bhakti Beats" playlist. Sources whisper that I I M Ahmedabad is running a case study: "The R O I of Raaga: Can Classical Music Save Your Startup?".

unnormalised: Rumours are flying that Karan Johar is already prepping a sequel to "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil," but this time, Ranbir Kapoor's heartbreak will be soundtracked entirely by ad jingles on repeat. (Sponsored, of course. Because Dharma Productions).

unnormalised: Analysts predict a further 20% jump in subscribers by Diwali. So, dim the diyas, crank up the volume, and prepare for another year of algorithmic recommendations that somehow *still* haven't figured out you hate Yo Yo Honey Singh. Just kidding…sort of. Streaming services: the gift that keeps on giving (earworms).
